snippet.title: ONEIRO | First-Person Indie Dungeon Crawler | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Oneiro is a solo developed project created to give a unique experience to fans of the rogue genre.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1235800/Oneiro 

Oneiro throws you into your own lucid nightmares through your sleep cycle; Travel through procedural generated labyrinths, fight monsters, collect/stack loot, and defeat the physical manifestation of Fear in REM sleep.
